name: NCradle: An 80s Synth Adventure
description: Hack into Newton Corporation, evade their firewalls, discover their research, and escape with your prize!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10, 64 bit Processor: 2.0GHz or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: > OpenGL 3.3 Support Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
